Yesterday, the bipartisan legislation I authored with ⁦@RepDwightEvans⁩, H.R. 5146, “Unlocking Opportunities for Small Businesses Act of 2019,” was unanimously approved by ⁦⁦@HouseSmallBiz⁩. Learn more below: https://hagedorn.house.gov/media/press-releases/contracting-bill-approved-small-business-cmte …

The AWE Act allows the use of pre-tax 529 education savings plans for certificate programs, apprenticeships, vocational training and the purchase of equipment, and will help fill high-wage jobs, expand economic opportunity and empower hardworking Americans to achieve their dreams

During ⁦@HouseSmallBiz⁩ Subcommittee meeting we discussed the need to fill 300k open construction jobs in America. I appreciated receiving support for my bipartisan vocational training bill from Phillip Ogilby of STACK Construction Technologies. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=52DuqCOCRfY …

On Saturday, we had staff on hand to celebrate Morristown @AmericanLegion Post 149’s 100th anniversary. Veteran outreach officer Joe Steck presented a flag that flew over the U.S. Capitol to Post Commander Dennis Schmidtke. Here’s to another 100 years! pic.twitter.com/bRlgqbKmRr

To keep building momentum, I urge my Democrat colleagues to encourage Speaker Pelosi to schedule a vote on the U.S.-Mexico-Canada (USMCA) trade agreement. I’m a strong supporter of USMCA, which will especially help farmers and agriculture. #USMCAnow

This also represents a big step forward in our quest to secure a meaningful trade deal with China, one that will open up new markets, grow the U.S. economy, expand investment in local businesses and create new high-wage jobs.

Given MN’s status as the #1 turkey producer in the nation, along with all our other poultry interests, this long-awaited development is a huge win for our farmers and rural way of life. #MN01 https://www.wsj.com/articles/china-lifts-4-year-ban-on-u-s-chicken-11573746696 …

As a longtime proponent of price transparency to encourage medical care shopping and health care savings, I view this proposal as a great 1st step. We need price transparency for prescription drugs. I will keep working on these types of commonsense reforms https://www.cnbc.com/amp/2019/11/15/trump-releases-rule-requiring-hospitals-and-insurers-to-disclose-negotiated-rates.html …

Yesterday, executives from ⁦@amazon⁩ and ⁦@Google⁩ appeared before ⁦@HouseSmallBiz⁩ about big tech’s impact on small business. I expressed my concerns about Google’s potential for picking winners and losers in search algorithms. Watch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oNRtsNuYpkA …

Happy Veterans Day to all those who fought to defend our nation and American way of life.

One of my great privileges has been meeting so many of our military heroes and hearing their stories of courage, service and valor.
